verses.verse: O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, rebuke <S%H3198><s%> me not in your anger <S%H639><s%>, neither chasten <S%H3256><s%> me in your hot displeasure <S%H2534><s%>.
Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord; for I am weak <S%H536><s%>: O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, heal <S%H7495><s%> me <S%H6106><s%>; for my bones are troubled <S%H926><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> is also severely <S%H3966><s%> troubled <S%H926><s%>: but you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, how long?
Return <S%H7725><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, deliver <S%H2502><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>: oh save <S%H3467><s%> me for your mercies <S%H2617><s%>' sake.
For in death <S%H4194><s%> there is no memory <S%H2143><s%> of you <S%H7585><s%>: in the grave who shall give you thanks <S%H3034><s%>?

I am weary <S%H3021><s%> with my groaning <S%H585><s%>; all the night <S%H3915><s%> make I my bed <S%H4296><s%> to swim <S%H7811><s%>; I water <S%H4529><s%> my couch <S%H6210><s%> with my tears <S%H1832><s%>.
My eye <S%H5869><s%> is consumed <S%H6244><s%> because of grief <S%H3708><s%>; it waxes old <S%H6275><s%> because of all my enemies <S%H6887><s%>.
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from me <S%H6466><s%>, all you workers of iniquity <S%H205><s%>; for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my weeping <S%H1065><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> my supplication <S%H8467><s%>; the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will receive <S%H3947><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>.
Let all my enemies <S%H341><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and severe <S%H3966><s%> troubled <S%H926><s%>: let them return <S%H7725><s%> and be ashamed <S%H954><s%> suddenly <S%H7281><s%>.
